QuestData.Title: Hana'zua
QuestData.Description:
Hey mon, take a knee and hear me out. We got a problem.
A good friend of mine, Hana'zua, has gone out into the valley and he hasn't returned. Last I seen, he was headin' north, where the scorpids hunt. Maybe you go take a look for him? The spirits be tellin' me that he's not well.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Hana'zua in the Valley of Trials.
